description: Advise and represent clients in legal matters, conduct research, and litigate cases.
Create visual concepts using computer software or by hand, to communicate ideas that inspire, inform, or captivate consumers.
Design user-friendly and intuitive interfaces for digital products.
Develop and implement marketing strategies to promote products or services and drive brand awareness.
Develop and maintain technical systems and software.
Educate and guide high school students in various subjects, fostering their academic and personal growth.
Extract insights from data using statistical and machine learning methods.
Help individuals, families, and communities cope with various challenges and improve their well-being.
Install, maintain, and repair electrical wiring, equipment, and fixtures.
Manage supply chain and distribution operations.
Perform specialized manual tasks and maintenance.
Plan menus, prepare food, and manage kitchen operations in restaurants or other food service establishments.
Produce goods and ensure quality control.
Provide direct patient care, administer medications, and educate patients and families.
